text.div:
Release Date: 2016-03-23

LevelCodeDisplayDefinition
1D deferred The receiver may respond in a non-immediate manner. Note: this will be the default value.
1I immediate The receiver is required to assume that the sender is blocking and behave appropriately by sending an immediate response.
1Q queue The receiver shall keep any application responses in a queue until such time as the queue is polled.

name: v3 Code System ResponseMode
description: Specifies the mode, immediate versus deferred or queued, by which a receiver should communicate its receiver responsibilities.

concept.definition: The receiver may respond in a non-immediate manner. Note: this will be the default value.
The receiver is required to assume that the sender is blocking and behave appropriately by sending an immediate response.
The receiver shall keep any application responses in a queue until such time as the queue is polled.
